name: Project White
description:
PROJECT: WHITE is a first-person shooter, action and adventure in which the player is identified as Subject 53, a test subject, owned by WHITE. The Subjects are tested with WHITE substances, which gives them the ability to automatically learn, what the substance allows them to do, as if it were a kind of "super power".  

However, something goes wrong. The player, Subject 53, will have the objective of exploring the corporation, facing waves of WHITE security to be able to escape from the facilities and discover the truth behind WHITE and everything that is happening.
